H0.text: Atmosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H1.text: Hydrosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H2.text: Lithosphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

H3.text: Hemisphere is the layered mixture of gases surrounding Earth.

A4.text: The atmosphere of Earth consists of a layer of mixed gas (commonly referred to as air) that is retained by gravity, surrounding the Earth's surface.

A5.text: The atmospheric stratification divides the Earth's atmosphere into five main layers with these typical altitude ranges:
